response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering its significance, we're offering it to you at this exclusive price of $20,000. This opportunity allows you to acquire a piece that could potentially enhance your business or personal endeavors significantly. We're confident that once you experience its benefits, you'll agree that this investment is well worth every penny. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further details about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 20000}
